name: All Fall Down
content: 就是这个声音，就是它，雨点声声敲打你窗
走向街道，此时你还并不明了
就是这个声音，就是它，你正在等待它
If ever your world starts crashing down
上帝怜爱你，悲悯你痛苦的灵魂
别着急，慢慢来，让我做你的依靠
We just can't get it right
只是我们没有站在巨人的肩膀
If ever your world starts crashing down
被人发现之前躲起来静静疗伤
Know that we all fall down
Know that we all fall down
If ever your world starts crashing down
If ever your world starts crashing down
被人发现之前躲起来静静疗伤
Know that we all fall down
Know that we all fall down
被人发现之前躲起来静静疗伤
Know that we all fall down
Know that we all fall down
